actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to exempt insured loans from certain limitations of section 5 (c) of the Home Owners' Loan Act of 1933.

summary.text: Amends the House Owners' Loan Act of 1933 to exempt qualified mortgage insurers from the limitation placed on Federal savings and loan associations which forbids them to make loans secured by other than savings accounts and first liens on real property within 100 miles of their home office.

titles.title: A bill to exempt insured loans from certain limitations of section 5 (c) of the Home Owners' Loan Act of 1933.
